original_text: The people went around gathering it, and then ground it in a hand mill or crushed it in a mortar. They cooked it in a pot or made it into loaves. And it tasted like something made with olive oil.
korean_text: 백성이 두루 다니며 그것을 거두어 맷돌에 갈기도 하며 절구에 찧기도 하고 가마에 삶기도 하여 과자를 만들었으니 그 맛이 기름 섞은 과자 맛 같았더라

sentences.original_text: The people went around gathering it
and then ground it in a hand mill
or crushed it in a mortar
They cooked it in a pot
And it tasted like something made with olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 올리브유로 만든 것처럼 맛이 있었습니다
